name: No more than this many characters
description: The maximum number of characters that must be present in the simple data type to be considered a "valid" instance.

element.short: No more than this many characters
element.formal: The maximum number of characters that must be present in the simple data type to be considered a "valid" instance.
element.comments: For base64binary, reflects the number of characters representing the encoded data, not the number of bytes of the binary data.
